shiny.gentelella 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Element R6 Class representing a UI Element

Source: R/element.R
Element.Rd

This is the abstract base class for all UI elements.

Value

top-level class name element's uuid

Details

An object that is meant to be the base type for all user-interface elements. The primary driver for having a base type for all UI elements is that every ui should have a unique id for shiny module dispatch, and basic descriptors that assist with robust logging.

  • Element$class_name()
